name: java (fluent)
content: I've taken multiple Java classes and made a variety of projects both in and out of the classroom.

name: python (proficient)
content: Python is the premier language for Machine Learning; I've spent more time on Pandas than I want to admit lol.

name: c++ (fluent)
content: This is the first object-oriented language I learned, and is where I've developed the majority of my projects.

name: html (fluent)
content: As a front-end developer among other things, I'm well-versed with HTML's ins-and-outs as the backbone of a website.

name: css (proficient)
content: Like HTML, my decent amount of web-dev experience has enabled me to navigate CSS with (relative) ease.

name: javascript (decent)
content: This is the newest language I've picked up. Hopefully you like some of the animations I added to this site :D.
